com.isotrol.impe3.nr.api
Class NodeQueries

java.lang.Object
  com.isotrol.impe3.nr.api.NodeQueries
Direct Known Subclasses:
ContentQueries
public class NodeQueries
extends Object

Queries constructor helper. This class is not final and has a protected constructor to allow subclasses to extend the provided set of helper methods in a single namespace. However, this class is not instantiable.

Author:
Emilio Escobar Reyero, Andres Rodriguez Chamorro

public static NodeQuery wildcard(String field,
